about_the_game:
This DLC Contains The Return of the King Quest.
Your Goal is to help the Prince restore his kingdom’s faded glory.

His father was a good king and his kingdom was great and prosperous.
When Prince grew up, he set out on a campaign and when he returned, he found his father dead and the kingdom in decline.

The time has come to restore the kingdom’s former glory!
detailed_description:
This DLC Contains The Return of the King Quest.
Your Goal is to help the Prince restore his kingdom’s faded glory.

His father was a good king and his kingdom was great and prosperous.
When Prince grew up, he set out on a campaign and when he returned, he found his father dead and the kingdom in decline.

The time has come to restore the kingdom’s former glory!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

His father was a good king and his kingdom was great and prosperous. When Prince grew up, he set out on a campaign and when he returned, he found his father dead and the kingdom in decline.
